Posts.Content: hi im a 42 yr old lady who found out i had breast cancer last july , i went through intensive chemo for 6 months then surgery then radiotherapy, i finished all treatment in march , but since then my body feels like ive been hit with a bus over and over again, and all i get of the nurses is "its the side effects of all ur treatment" . i am in alot of pain, i cant sleep i cant go out because i cant walk far, i cant sit for long periods of time, otherwise all my body ceases up, i am at the end of my tether now, as anyone got any advice please Tracy x
Posts.Title: life after cancer
